roleset.name: the color white

role.descr: thing that is white in color
specific part of arg1, if also mentioned

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet, black-j.01.

example.name: both args
example.text: One was black of hair and blue of eyes the other was white of hair and violet of eyes.

roleset.name: of an ethnic background featuring light skin
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, FrameNet.

example.name: arg1
example.text: When you look at other western countries like Canada , America , Australia , the vast majority of its immigrants are not white these days and are probably heading for a more diverse future , so much so to the point that these nations will have very different demographic look to them in 50 years time .
example.arg: When you look at other western countries like Canada, America, Australia
the vast majority of its immigrants
